articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Pamphlet in Cuba
Reception Given by Russian Ambassador
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Pamphlet in Cuba 
    Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Il' s famous work "The Workers' Party of Korea Is the Party of the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung" was published in pamphlet by the Cubanas Publishing House of Cuba on October 5.
 The work, issued on October 2, Juche 84 (1995), is an immortal great program of the building of the Party and its activities that proudly reviews the glorious history of the Workers' Party of Korea in paving a new way of building a revolutionary party in the era of independence and indicates the road of strengthening and developing the Party eternally as the Party of President Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: President of Vanuatu Supports Cause of Korean Reunification
Congolese President Expresses Solidarity with Korean People
articles.content:
President of Vanuatu Supports Cause of Korean Reunification 
    Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- Kalkot Mataskelekele, president of the Republic of Vanuatu, said his government would continue to support the unshakable policy and efforts of the government of the DPRK for achieving the Korean reunification peacefully by implementing the north-south joint declaration adopted on June 15, 2000.
 When receiving credentials from Chon Jae Hong, DPRK ambassador e. p. to Vanuatu on Oct. 7, the president said his government and people well knew of the enormous efforts of the Korean people for building a great prosperous powerful socialist nation centering on the popular masses and achieving the independent and peaceful reunification of the country under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il, true to the noble intention of President Kim Il Sung.    
 He hoped that the friendly and cooperative relations between Vanuatu and the DPRK would grow in scope and develop in all fields, political, economic and cultural.

articles.title: Guinean Party Delegation Visits DPRK Embassy
articles.content:
Congolese President Expresses Solidarity with Korean People 
    Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- Congolese President Denis Sassou-Nguesso expressed firm solidarity with the Korean people in their struggle for accomplishing their just cause when receiving credentials from DPRK Ambassador e. p. to the Congo Ri Won Son on October 7.
 The president said the friendly relations between the two countries had been developing from a long time ago, adding that the two countries had supported and cooperated with each other in the international arena.

articles.title: Floral Basket to DPRK Embassy in Bangkok from Thai Prime Minister
articles.content:
Guinean Party Delegation Visits DPRK Embassy 
    Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Party for Unity and Progress of Guinea led by Secretary General Sekou Konate paid a congratulatory visit to the DPRK embassy in Conakry on October 8 on the occasion of the 59th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
 The delegation laid a floral basket before portraits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.    
 The secretary general said the founding anniversary of the WPK was also a holiday of his party because the WPK was the vanguard and banner of the progressive political parties all over the world. He declared that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two parties and two peoples would always remain invariable.

articles.title: U.S. Congressional Passage of "North Korean Human Rights Act" Denounced
articles.content:
Floral Basket to DPRK Embassy in Bangkok from Thai Prime Minister 
    Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- Thai Prime Minister Thaksin Shinawatra who is leader of Thai Rak Thai Party sent a floral basket to the DPRK embassy in Bangkok on October 8 on the occasion of the 59th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
 The floral basket was laid before the full-length picture of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.

articles.content:
One Million Signature Campaign for Abolition of SL Starts
    Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- The People's Solidarity for the Abolition of the Security Law (SL) in south Korea reportedly conducted street-propaganda in Seoul on Oct. 8 as part of a million signature campaign for the abolition of SL.
 Kwon O Hon, chairman of the Society Supporting Prisoners of Conscience of the Family Movement for Realizing Democracy, taking part in the propaganda, said that on the strength of the SL many patriots have been punished over the last 56 years and even now innocent youth and students are thrown behind bars.    
 Song Hyon Sok, chairman in charge of Political Affairs of the Council of Youth Organizations of south Korea, held that the SL defining the north as an enemy should be abolished at once for the reunification of the south and the north.

articles.content:
DPRK-China Cooperation in Field of Oceanography
    Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- There were talks between a delegation of the DPRK Hydro-Meteorological Service and a delegation of the State Oceanic Administration of China in Pyongyang on Oct. 13.
 At the talks both sides exchanged views on further developing the cooperation in the field of oceanography between the two countries and a series of matters of mutual concern.    
 Present there from the DPRK side were members of the delegation of the DPRK Hydro-Meteorological Service headed by its Deputy Director Ho Chang Suk and from the Chinese side members of the delegation of the State Oceanic Administration of China led by its Deputy Director Zhou Maoping.
